EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Attendance Confirmation India - 12/3
EmailTemplate.subject: Your attendance is confirmed: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - India 12/3
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for confirming your attendance for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in India on Wednesday, December 3, 2014. We look forward to you joining us!
Please print this confirmation email and present upon your arrival to the event.
Event Details:
Date: Wednesday, December 3, 2014 Location: EMC Software & Services India Pvt Ltd <https://www.google.com/maps/place/EMC+Corporation,+KR+Puram+Marathahalli+Ring+Road/@12.981664,77.693874,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x3bae11798af9124d:0x8a99c000f170374b> Time: 9:15AM - 5:00PM (morning tea and lunch served)
You will receive one more email from us with additional details and prerequisites soon.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
